name: scratch-map
description: Scratch Map is a self-hosted microblogging platform similar to Twitter with markdown support, media uploads, and a responsive UI.
features: Travel tracking: Mark countries and regions visited on an interactive world map.
Visual progress: See percentage of world explored with color-coded territories.
Multiple maps: Track different trip types with separate maps for countries, states, or custom regions.
Sharing options: Generate shareable links or images of your travel map for social media.
Statistics: View detailed stats on countries visited, continents explored, and travel milestones.
Custom markers: Add notes, photos, and dates to specific locations for memory keeping.
Privacy controls: Keep maps private or share publicly with customizable visibility settings.
Mobile responsive: Access and update your travel map from any device.
Export data: Download travel history as JSON or CSV for backup and analysis.
Goal setting: Set travel goals and track progress toward visiting target destinations.
Collaborative maps: Share editing access with travel partners for joint trip tracking.
Offline support: Cache map data for viewing and editing without internet connection.
